Guide for the 2nd Class Transfer:
To perform the 2nd class transfer, go to the Masters of each race in the Town of Gludio.
You're eligible if your level is 38 or above.

Human Fighter: Warrior Guild Human Mage: Einhasad Temple
Elven Fighter: Warrior Guild Elven Mage: Einhasad Temple
Dark Elf: Dark Elf Guild
Orc: Orc Guild
Kamael: Kamael Guild
Dwarf: Blacksmith's Workshop
